channel.title: The chaos elemental removes your weapon [317]
channel.description:
I spawned a level 1 rat and every time i attack it, it hits 10's and 20's on me and removes my weapon and says "the chaos elemental removes your weapon".
Help me turn it into a normal rat! NOT A RAT ON STEROIDZZZZ

item.title: The chaos elemental removes your weapon [317]
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“puffypain, post:3, topic:352263”]thanks, i’d rep you but i need 15 :o[/quote] No problem dude ;). Any other help you need, just pm me or make a new topic, and I`ll do my best.

Read full topic
